name: 林子喬
objective:
Discuss the principles and features of kinds of electric machines, including (1) Physical Fundamentals of Newton's Law, Faraday's Law, Rotational Motion, and Power; (2) Concepts of Magnetic Field; (3) Electrical-Mechanical Energy Conversion; (4) Winding and Air-gap Magnetomotive Force; (5) Winding Inductance and Voltage Equation; (6) Linear DC Machine; (7) Transformers; (8) DC Machines.

探討各種電機工作原理及特性，內容包含：(1) 牛頓定理、法拉第定理、旋轉運動，與功率等物理基礎 (2) 磁路觀念；(3) 電機 - 機械能量轉換；(4) 繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (5) 繞組電感及電壓方程式；(6) 線性直流電機；(7) 變壓器；(8) 直流電機
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction and Rules (課程簡介及上課規則)
W2~W6: Fundamentals & Electromagnetic Conversion Theories (基礎及電磁能量轉換)
W7~W9: Transformers & Course Review  (變壓器及課程複習)
W10: Midterm Exam (期中考試)
W11: Midterm Commentary (期中檢討)
W12~W14: Transformers (變壓器)
W15~W16: Theories of DC Machines (直流電機工作原理)
W17: Oral Report (口頭報告)
W18: Final Exam (期末考試)
scorePolicy: (一). Attendance, Discussion and Homework (平時)：40% ; (二). Midterm (期中)：30% ; (三). Final (期末)：30%
